QuestData.Title: Sea Legs
QuestData.Description: Welcome to The Briny Cutter, $c.$b$bI am Erunak, the last surviving passenger of this once-proud vessel.$b$bI'm afraid your travails have only just begun. The naga have been attacking here relentlessly.$b$bYou're not equipped to be of much help down here yet, but I can remedy that.$b$bJust outside this ship live a special breed of starfish. Bring me some of them along with a conch shell. I'll prepare an enchantment that should help to increase your chances of survival.
QuestData.LogDescription: Erunak in The Briny Cutter wants you to bring him 3 Saltwater Starfish and a Conch Shell from Seafarer's Tomb.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is good to see that you're still alive, $r.$b$bHave you found the items I require?
QuestData.RewardText: Here you are, $c. With this you should find maneuvering in the sea to be nearly effortless. $b$bNow we must get to work. There is much to be done in little time.
